oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Snodgrass House, Chickamauga Park, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of the Snodgrass House at Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. There are two cannons and a monument outside of the house. Features a divided back and narrative on reverse. [No. A-12779]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Log cabins; Trees; Cannons; Monuments & memorials
